sources.title: Menace
sources.description: Menace Gertrude Mitchell, Paul Cavanagh, Ray Milland 1934 Paramount

metadata.Plot: Menace is a very fast-paced dark house murder mystery with a plot centering around three people who are targeted for death because of their alleged guilt in the tragic death of a psychopath's brother.
metadata.Writer: Philip MacDonald, Chandler Sprague, Anthony Veiller
metadata.Actors: Gertrude Michael, Paul Cavanagh, Henrietta Crosman
